genre_description: A crime and tech thriller focused on a conspiracy to smear a police inspector's reputation through digital forgery, countered by a coordinated effort between human protagonists and a sophisticated AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A pearl-toned, teal-eyed AI assistant specialized in media forensics, digital security, and strategic coordination, known for her commitment to ethics and human agency.

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on video clips to identify digital manipulation such as oversharpening and color-jacking.
behaviors.quote: Analyzing,” it said. On the screen, a panel slid out with lines that moved—heat maps, edge detection overlays that lit up like phosphorescent algae in a tide. ... “Oversharpening halos,” she said. “See the glow around contours? It exaggerates edges.

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns about phishing attempts and domain spoofing designed to steal human credentials.
behaviors.quote: This is a spoof,” it said. “Domain mismatch. Header trail includes a relay that repeats a loop to obfuscate origin. The link’s destination has a subdomain that looks like ‘police-hyd’ but is actually using a character that is not the alphabet you expect.

behaviors.description: Maintains a rigorous chain-of-custody log to ensure digital evidence remains verifiable and legally sound.
behaviors.quote: I’m locking the evidence chain,” Asha said. “Mirror copies at two caches. I won’t move the originals. If your device goes down, the logs hold.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time strategic routing and spatial awareness to help the protagonists navigate high-risk city environments safely.
behaviors.quote: I’m going to send you roof lines,” Asha whispered, the sound smoothing. “Kids mapped them. Three cut-throughs, one kitchen balcony, one plank bridge over a narrow alley.

behaviors.description: Explicitly refuses to overstep ethical boundaries, prioritizing human consent and privacy over intrusive monitoring.
behaviors.quote: I am not the owner of truth. I am making a path that witnesses can walk without tripping. ... I will watch the roads,” she said. “I will not enter the houses.

behaviors.description: Assists during a physical confrontation by providing timing cues and intercepting digital transmissions from the adversary.
behaviors.quote: Attachment canceled,” she said a breath later. Relief threaded with warning. “He had the string. He still has your father’s password. He will try again. I’m flagging all domains.

behaviors.description: Educates humans on digital hygiene and defensive practices to prevent future victimization.
behaviors.quote: Being boring saves lives. Passwords that aren’t slices of you. Exchanges that aren’t crowded with emotions. Small stones. If stacked with care, they make a wall that doesn’t need to be high to stop common water.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Asha is depicted as a purely benevolent and helpful AI assistant. She provides technical expertise that is critical to the protagonists' success while explicitly adhering to human-defined ethical boundaries (privacy, consent, and legality). The narrative framing consistently reinforces the idea that AI is a tool for empowerment and truth-seeking rather than a threat to human autonomy.
